Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry
Rallying Cry.flavor: You shout an inspiring war cry, and your voice rings above the din of battle. Your allies surge into the fight.
Rallying Cry.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Rallying Cry.effect: Until the end of your next turn, all targets gain a +2 power bonus to speed and a +1 power bonus to saving throws.

For Cormyr!.name: For Cormyr!
For Cormyr!.flavor: Your battle cry becomes a chant as one after another of your allies join in. The enemy recoils in fear.
For Cormyr!.onHit: You push the target 2 squares. The target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls, all defenses, and saving throws (save ends).
For Cormyr!.effect: Each ally in the burst gains 25 temporary hit points.
For Cormyr!.onMiss: The target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls, all defenses, and saving throws (save ends).

Rallying Attack.name: Rallying Attack
Rallying Attack.flavor: As you lay into your foe with another powerful swing, the ring of steel and your mighty war cry show your allies that victory is yours for the taking.
Rallying Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
